column1: 1. Enter your plan's IUA (Initial Unshared Amount / Deductible)

column2: you'll pay: IUA + (percent coinsurance on costs beyond IUA)

column1: - YOU PAY: Your IUA (up to $500) = $180 (less than IUA)
- Your cost: $180 (if you haven't hit your IUA yet)
- YOU PAY: Your IUA + 20% coinsurance on $14
- YOU PAY: Your IUA + 20% coinsurance on $49
Compare your actual plan's costs to these scenarios to understand your true expenses.
